Emirati-Russian Investment Forum 2024: A Gateway to Global Business Opportunities

We are thrilled to announce the Emirati-Russian Investment Forum, taking place on October 4, 2024, in Dubai. This premier event is designed to foster stronger trade and investment relations between the UAE and Russia, offering unparalleled opportunities for businesses and investors from both regions.

Forum Objectives

The Emirati-Russian Investment Forum is committed to achieving the following objectives:

  • Exchange of Trade Relations: Enhance and expand trade relations between the UAE and Russia.
  • Investment Opportunities:Present and clarify rare investment opportunities in the Emirates, particularly in Dubai.
  • Stimulate Investment:Facilitate investment exchange among participants, highlighting the latest in smart and sustainable investment trends.
  • Economic Conditions:Analyze latent economic conditions and opportunities, fostering discussions and agreements between governments, businessmen, and investors.
  • Support Entrepreneurship:Identify and support entrepreneurial products and services, strengthening regional and international companies.
  • Leadership Position: Position your company as a leader by showcasing its contributions and strengthening partnerships both regionally and internationally.
- We all intend to plan ahead.

Event Highlights

Attendees will have the unique opportunity to:

  • Engage with Key Figures: Meet Sheikhs, Their Excellencies, dignitaries, businessmen from the UAE and Russia, media figures, and journalists.
  • Showcase Your Company:Your Company logo will be prominently displayed, and a video explaining your company and products will be featured during the conference.
  • Network and Celebrate: Enjoy an elegant dinner party and attend exclusive Emirati and Russian concerts.
  • Gain Recognition: Enhance your company's visibility, leaving a lasting impression on attendees and gaining recognition as a leading business in the UAE.

No matter how many buildings, foundations, schools and hospitals we build, or how many bridges we raise, all these are material entities. The real spirit behind progress is the human spirit, the able man with his intellect and capabilities. The ruler should not have any barrier which separates him from his people. ---- Sheikh Zayed

Subscription Benefits

By subscribing to the Emirati-Russian Investment Forum, you will receive:

  • The prestigious Shield of Leadership and Excellence from Sheikhs and Their Excellencies.
  • Prominent display of your company's logo throughout the conference.
  • A dedicated video presentation of your companyâ€™s products and services.
  • Exclusive networking opportunities with VIPs and social media celebrities.
  • Enhanced visibility and reputation in the UAE business community.
